```scss
// Property: physicalSizeCategory
// Description: The physical size category of the Android device or emulator.
// Component(s): Ti.Platform.Android
'.physical-size-category-large': { physicalSizeCategory: Ti.Platform.Android.PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_LARGE }
'.physical-size-category-normal': { physicalSizeCategory: Ti.Platform.Android.PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_NORMAL }
'.physical-size-category-small': { physicalSizeCategory: Ti.Platform.Android.PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_SMALL }
'.physical-size-category-undefined': { physicalSizeCategory: Ti.Platform.Android.PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_UNDEFINED }
'.physical-size-category-xlarge': { physicalSizeCategory: Ti.Platform.Android.PHYSICAL_SIZE_CATEGORY_XLARGE }
```
